description.ko: 순수한 빛의 연약한 기하학, 단 하나의 광선이 수천 개의 수정 같은 꿈으로 부서집니다.
description.en: A fragile geometry of pure light, where a single beam shatters into a thousand crystalline dreams.

prompt: An intricate web of dew-covered spider silk made of synthetic diamond, suspended in a dark, minimalist void. A single concentrated beam of light hits the web, causing extreme spectral dispersion and rainbow caustics. Focus on the high refractive indices of the diamond droplets and the chromatic aberration at the edges of the light splits. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Global illumination and cinematic lighting capture the pure energy of the rainbow contained within the crystalline structure.
